docstring.long_description: The SENSOR node can be used to convert voltage into temperature measurements.
docstring.short_description: Read voltages from a sensor connected to a LABJACK U3 device.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Defines the number of temperature sensors connected to the LabJack U3 device.

returns.description: The output of the node is a list of voltages measured from the sensors.
